00027 void gravity_tree(void)
00028 {
00029   long long ntot;
00030   int numnodes, nexportsum = 0;
00031   int i, j, iter = 0;
00032   int *numnodeslist, maxnumnodes, nexport, *numlist, *nrecv, *ndonelist;
00033   double tstart, tend, timetree = 0, timecommsumm = 0, timeimbalance = 0, sumimbalance;
00034   double ewaldcount;
00035   double costtotal, ewaldtot, *costtreelist, *ewaldlist;
00036   double maxt, sumt, *timetreelist, *timecommlist;
00037   double fac, plb, plb_max, sumcomm;
00038 
00039 #ifndef NOGRAVITY
00040   int *noffset, *nbuffer, *nsend, *nsend_local;
00041   long long ntotleft;
00042   int ndone, maxfill, ngrp;
00043   int k, place;
00044   int level, sendTask, recvTask;
00045   double ax, ay, az;
00046   MPI_Status status;
00047 #endif
00048 
00049 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
00050   unsigned long *Nself_interactionsList;
00051 #endif
00052 
00053   /* set new softening lengths */
00054   if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn)
00055     set_softenings();
00056 
00057 
00058   /* contruct tree if needed */
00059   tstart = second();
00060   if(TreeReconstructFlag)
00061     {
00062       if(ThisTask == 0)
00063         printf("Tree construction.\n");
00064 
00065       force_treebuild(NumPart);
00066 
00067       TreeReconstructFlag = 0;
00068 
00069       if(ThisTask == 0)
00070         printf("Tree construction done.\n");
00071     }
00072   tend = second();
00073   All.CPU_TreeConstruction += timediff(tstart, tend);
00074 
00075   costtotal = ewaldcount = 0;
00076 
00077   /* Note: 'NumForceUpdate' has already been determined in find_next_sync_point_and_drift() */
00078   numlist = malloc(NTask * sizeof(int) * NTask);
00079   MPI_Allgather(&NumForceUpdate, 1, MPI_INT, numlist, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00080   for(i = 0, ntot = 0; i < NTask; i++)
00081     ntot += numlist[i];
00082   free(numlist);
00083 
00084 
00085 #ifndef NOGRAVITY
00086   if(ThisTask == 0)
00087     printf("Begin tree force.\n");
00088 
00089 
00090 #ifdef SELECTIVE_NO_GRAVITY
00091   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00092     if(((1 << P[i].Type) & (SELECTIVE_NO_GRAVITY)))
00093       P[i].Ti_endstep = -P[i].Ti_endstep - 1;
00094 #endif
00095 
00096 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
00097   All.Nself_interactions = 0;
00098   All.Nself_interactionsSum = 0;
00099   for (i = 0; i < INTERACTION_TABLE_LENGTH; i++)
00100     for(j = 0; j < PARTICLE_MAX_INTERACTIONS + 1; j++)
00101       InteractionTable[i][j] = 0;
00102 #endif
00103 
00104   noffset = malloc(sizeof(int) * NTask);        /* offsets of bunches in common list */
00105   nbuffer = malloc(sizeof(int) * NTask);
00106   nsend_local = malloc(sizeof(int) * NTask);
00107   nsend = malloc(sizeof(int) * NTask * NTask);
00108   ndonelist = malloc(sizeof(int) * NTask);
00109 
00110   i = 0;                        /* beginn with this index */
00111   ntotleft = ntot;              /* particles left for all tasks together */
00112 
00113   while(ntotleft > 0)
00114     {
00115       iter++;
00116 
00117       for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00118         nsend_local[j] = 0;
00119 
00120       /* do local particles and prepare export list */
00121       tstart = second();
00122       for(nexport = 0, ndone = 0; i < NumPart && nexport < All.BunchSizeForce - NTask; i++)
00123         if(P[i].Ti_endstep == All.Ti_Current)
00124           {
00125             ndone++;
00126 
00127             for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00128               Exportflag[j] = 0;
00129 #ifndef PMGRID
00130             costtotal += force_treeevaluate(i, 0, &ewaldcount);
00131 #else
00132             costtotal += force_treeevaluate_shortrange(i, 0);
00133 #endif
00134             for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00135               {
00136                 if(Exportflag[j])
00137                   {
00138                     for(k = 0; k < 3; k++)
00139                       GravDataGet[nexport].u.Pos[k] = P[i].Pos[k];
00140 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
00141                     for(k = 0; k < 3; k++)
00142                       GravDataGet[nexport].Vel[k] = P[i].Vel[k];                  
00143                     GravDataGet[nexport].Ti_begstep = P[i].Ti_begstep;
00144                     GravDataGet[nexport].Ti_endstep = P[i].Ti_endstep;
00145                     GravDataGet[nexport].ID = P[i].ID;
00146                     GravDataGet[nexport].Type = P[i].Type;
00147 #endif
00148 #ifdef UNEQUALSOFTENINGS
00149                     GravDataGet[nexport].Type = P[i].Type;
00150 #ifdef ADAPTIVE_GRAVSOFT_FORGAS
00151                     if(P[i].Type == 0)
00152                       GravDataGet[nexport].Soft = SphP[i].Hsml;
00153 #endif
00154 #endif
00155                     GravDataGet[nexport].w.OldAcc = P[i].OldAcc;
00156                     GravDataIndexTable[nexport].Task = j;
00157                     GravDataIndexTable[nexport].Index = i;
00158                     GravDataIndexTable[nexport].SortIndex = nexport;
00159                     nexport++;
00160                     nexportsum++;
00161                     nsend_local[j]++;
00162                   }
00163               }
00164           }
00165       tend = second();
00166       timetree += timediff(tstart, tend);
00167 
00168       qsort(GravDataIndexTable, nexport, sizeof(struct gravdata_index), grav_tree_compare_key);
00169 
00170       for(j = 0; j < nexport; j++)
00171         GravDataIn[j] = GravDataGet[GravDataIndexTable[j].SortIndex];
00172 
00173       for(j = 1, noffset[0] = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00174         noffset[j] = noffset[j - 1] + nsend_local[j - 1];
00175 
00176       tstart = second();
00177 
00178       MPI_Allgather(nsend_local, NTask, MPI_INT, nsend, NTask, MPI_INT, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00179 
00180       tend = second();
00181       timeimbalance += timediff(tstart, tend);
00182 
00183       /* now do the particles that need to be exported */
00184 
00185       for(level = 1; level < (1 << PTask); level++)
00186         {
00187           tstart = second();
00188           for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00189             nbuffer[j] = 0;
00190           for(ngrp = level; ngrp < (1 << PTask); ngrp++)
00191             {
00192               maxfill = 0;
00193               for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00194                 {
00195                   if((j ^ ngrp) < NTask)
00196                     if(maxfill < nbuffer[j] + nsend[(j ^ ngrp) * NTask + j])
00197                       maxfill = nbuffer[j] + nsend[(j ^ ngrp) * NTask + j];
00198                 }
00199               if(maxfill >= All.BunchSizeForce)
00200                 break;
00201 
00202               sendTask = ThisTask;
00203               recvTask = ThisTask ^ ngrp;
00204 
00205               if(recvTask < NTask)
00206                 {
00207                   if(nsend[ThisTask * NTask + recvTask] > 0 || nsend[recvTask * NTask + ThisTask] > 0)
00208                     {
00209                       /* get the particles */
00210                       MPI_Sendrecv(&GravDataIn[noffset[recvTask]],
00211                                    nsend_local[recvTask] * sizeof(struct gravdata_in), MPI_BYTE,
00212                                    recvTask, TAG_GRAV_A,
00213                                    &GravDataGet[nbuffer[ThisTask]],
00214                                    nsend[recvTask * NTask + ThisTask] * sizeof(struct gravdata_in), MPI_BYTE,
00215                                    recvTask, TAG_GRAV_A, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00216                     }
00217                 }
00218 
00219               for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00220                 if((j ^ ngrp) < NTask)
00221                   nbuffer[j] += nsend[(j ^ ngrp) * NTask + j];
00222             }
00223           tend = second();
00224           timecommsumm += timediff(tstart, tend);
00225 
00226 
00227           tstart = second();
00228           for(j = 0; j < nbuffer[ThisTask]; j++)
00229             {
00230 #ifndef PMGRID
00231               costtotal += force_treeevaluate(j, 1, &ewaldcount);
00232 #else
00233               costtotal += force_treeevaluate_shortrange(j, 1);
00234 #endif
00235             }
00236           tend = second();
00237           timetree += timediff(tstart, tend);
00238 
00239           tstart = second();
00240           MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00241           tend = second();
00242           timeimbalance += timediff(tstart, tend);
00243 
00244           /* get the result */
00245           tstart = second();
00246           for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00247             nbuffer[j] = 0;
00248           for(ngrp = level; ngrp < (1 << PTask); ngrp++)
00249             {
00250               maxfill = 0;
00251               for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00252                 {
00253                   if((j ^ ngrp) < NTask)
00254                     if(maxfill < nbuffer[j] + nsend[(j ^ ngrp) * NTask + j])
00255                       maxfill = nbuffer[j] + nsend[(j ^ ngrp) * NTask + j];
00256                 }
00257               if(maxfill >= All.BunchSizeForce)
00258                 break;
00259 
00260               sendTask = ThisTask;
00261               recvTask = ThisTask ^ ngrp;
00262               if(recvTask < NTask)
00263                 {
00264                   if(nsend[ThisTask * NTask + recvTask] > 0 || nsend[recvTask * NTask + ThisTask] > 0)
00265                     {
00266                       /* send the results */
00267                       MPI_Sendrecv(&GravDataResult[nbuffer[ThisTask]],
00268                                    nsend[recvTask * NTask + ThisTask] * sizeof(struct gravdata_in),
00269                                    MPI_BYTE, recvTask, TAG_GRAV_B,
00270                                    &GravDataOut[noffset[recvTask]],
00271                                    nsend_local[recvTask] * sizeof(struct gravdata_in),
00272                                    MPI_BYTE, recvTask, TAG_GRAV_B, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00273 
00274                       /* add the result to the particles */
00275                       for(j = 0; j < nsend_local[recvTask]; j++)
00276                         {
00277                           place = GravDataIndexTable[noffset[recvTask] + j].Index;
00278 
00279                           for(k = 0; k < 3; k++)
00280                             P[place].GravAccel[k] += GravDataOut[j + noffset[recvTask]].u.Acc[k];
00281 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
00282                           if( All.ErrTolTheta == 0 || All.TypeOfOpeningCriterion == 0)
00283                             {
00284                               for(k = 0; k < 3; k++)
00285                                 P[place].Vel[k] += GravDataOut[j + noffset[recvTask]].Vel[k];
00286                             }
00287 #endif
00288                           P[place].GravCost += GravDataOut[j + noffset[recvTask]].w.Ninteractions;
00289                         }
00290                     }
00291                 }
00292 
00293               for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00294                 if((j ^ ngrp) < NTask)
00295                   nbuffer[j] += nsend[(j ^ ngrp) * NTask + j];
00296             }
00297           tend = second();
00298           timecommsumm += timediff(tstart, tend);
00299 
00300           level = ngrp - 1;
00301         }
00302 
00303       MPI_Allgather(&ndone, 1, MPI_INT, ndonelist, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00304       for(j = 0; j < NTask; j++)
00305         ntotleft -= ndonelist[j];
00306     }
00307 
00308   free(ndonelist);
00309   free(nsend);
00310   free(nsend_local);
00311   free(nbuffer);
00312   free(noffset);
00313 
00314   /* now add things for comoving integration */
00315 
00316 #ifndef PERIODIC
00317 #ifndef PMGRID
00318   if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn)
00319     {
00320       fac = 0.5 * All.Hubble * All.Hubble * All.Omega0 / All.G;
00321 
00322       for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00323         if(P[i].Ti_endstep == All.Ti_Current)
00324           for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00325             P[i].GravAccel[j] += fac * P[i].Pos[j];
00326     }
00327 #endif
00328 #endif
00329 
00330   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00331     if(P[i].Ti_endstep == All.Ti_Current)
00332       {
00333 #ifdef PMGRID
00334         ax = P[i].GravAccel[0] + P[i].GravPM[0] / All.G;
00335         ay = P[i].GravAccel[1] + P[i].GravPM[1] / All.G;
00336         az = P[i].GravAccel[2] + P[i].GravPM[2] / All.G;
00337 #else
00338         ax = P[i].GravAccel[0];
00339         ay = P[i].GravAccel[1];
00340         az = P[i].GravAccel[2];
00341 #endif
00342         P[i].OldAcc = sqrt(ax * ax + ay * ay + az * az);
00343       }
00344 
00345 
00346   if(All.TypeOfOpeningCriterion == 1)
00347     All.ErrTolTheta = 0;        /* This will switch to the relative opening criterion for the following force computations */
00348 
00349   /*  muliply by G */
00350   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00351     if(P[i].Ti_endstep == All.Ti_Current)
00352       for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00353         P[i].GravAccel[j] *= All.G;
00354 
00355 
00356   /* Finally, the following factor allows a computation of a cosmological simulation 
00357      with vacuum energy in physical coordinates */
00358 #ifndef PERIODIC
00359 #ifndef PMGRID
00360   if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn == 0)
00361     {
00362       fac = All.OmegaLambda * All.Hubble * All.Hubble;
00363 
00364       for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00365         if(P[i].Ti_endstep == All.Ti_Current)
00366           for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00367             P[i].GravAccel[j] += fac * P[i].Pos[j];
00368     }
00369 #endif
00370 #endif
00371 
00372 #ifdef SELECTIVE_NO_GRAVITY
00373   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00374     if(P[i].Ti_endstep < 0)
00375       P[i].Ti_endstep = -P[i].Ti_endstep - 1;
00376 #endif
00377 
00378   if(ThisTask == 0)
00379     printf("tree is done.\n");
00380 
00381 #else /* gravity is switched off */
00382 
00383   for(i = 0; i < NumPart; i++)
00384     if(P[i].Ti_endstep == All.Ti_Current)
00385       for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00386         P[i].GravAccel[j] = 0;
00387 
00388 #endif
00389 
00390 
00391 
00392 
00393   /* Now the force computation is finished */
00394 
00395   /*  gather some diagnostic information */
00396 
00397   timetreelist = malloc(sizeof(double) * NTask);
00398   timecommlist = malloc(sizeof(double) * NTask);
00399   costtreelist = malloc(sizeof(double) * NTask);
00400   numnodeslist = malloc(sizeof(int) * NTask);
00401   ewaldlist = malloc(sizeof(double) * NTask);
00402   nrecv = malloc(sizeof(int) * NTask);
00403 
00404   numnodes = Numnodestree;
00405 
00406   MPI_Gather(&costtotal, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, costtreelist, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00407   MPI_Gather(&numnodes, 1, MPI_INT, numnodeslist, 1, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00408   MPI_Gather(&timetree, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, timetreelist, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00409   MPI_Gather(&timecommsumm, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, timecommlist, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00410   MPI_Gather(&NumPart, 1, MPI_INT, nrecv, 1, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00411   MPI_Gather(&ewaldcount, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, ewaldlist, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00412   MPI_Reduce(&nexportsum, &nexport, 1, MPI_INT, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00413   MPI_Reduce(&timeimbalance, &sumimbalance, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00414 
00415 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
00416   Nself_interactionsList = malloc(sizeof(int) * NTask);
00417   MPI_Gather(&All.Nself_interactions, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, Nself_interactionsList, 1, MPI_UNSIGNED_LONG, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00418 #endif
00419 
00420   if(ThisTask == 0)
00421     {
00422       All.TotNumOfForces += ntot;
00423 
00424       fprintf(FdTimings, "Step= %d  t= %g  dt= %g \n", All.NumCurrentTiStep, All.Time, All.TimeStep);
00425       fprintf(FdTimings, "Nf= %d%09d  total-Nf= %d%09d  ex-frac= %g  iter= %d\n",
00426               (int) (ntot / 1000000000), (int) (ntot % 1000000000),
00427               (int) (All.TotNumOfForces / 1000000000), (int) (All.TotNumOfForces % 1000000000),
00428               nexport / ((double) ntot), iter);
00429       /* note: on Linux, the 8-byte integer could be printed with the format identifier "%qd", but doesn't work on AIX */
00430 
00431       fac = NTask / ((double) All.TotNumPart);
00432 
00433       for(i = 0, maxt = timetreelist[0], sumt = 0, plb_max = 0,
00434           maxnumnodes = 0, costtotal = 0, sumcomm = 0, ewaldtot = 0; i < NTask; i++)
00435         {
00436 #ifdef COMPUTE_SELFINTERACTION_FORDARK
00437           All.Nself_interactionsSum += Nself_interactionsList[i];
00438 #endif
00439           costtotal += costtreelist[i];
00440 
00441           sumcomm += timecommlist[i];
00442 
00443           if(maxt < timetreelist[i])
00444             maxt = timetreelist[i];
00445           sumt += timetreelist[i];
00446 
00447           plb = nrecv[i] * fac;
00448 
00449           if(plb > plb_max)
00450             plb_max = plb;
00451 
00452           if(numnodeslist[i] > maxnumnodes)
00453             maxnumnodes = numnodeslist[i];
00454 
00455           ewaldtot += ewaldlist[i];
00456         }
00457       fprintf(FdTimings, "work-load balance: %g  max=%g avg=%g PE0=%g\n",
00458               maxt / (sumt / NTask), maxt, sumt / NTask, timetreelist[0]);
00459       fprintf(FdTimings, "particle-load balance: %g\n", plb_max);
00460       fprintf(FdTimings, "max. nodes: %d, filled: %g\n", maxnumnodes,
00461               maxnumnodes / (All.TreeAllocFactor * All.MaxPart));
00462       fprintf(FdTimings, "part/sec=%g | %g  ia/part=%g (%g)\n", ntot / (sumt + 1.0e-20),
00463               ntot / (maxt * NTask), ((double) (costtotal)) / ntot, ((double) ewaldtot) / ntot);
00464       fprintf(FdTimings, "\n");
00465 
00466       fflush(FdTimings);
00467 
00468       All.CPU_TreeWalk += sumt / NTask;
00469       All.CPU_Imbalance += sumimbalance / NTask;
00470       All.CPU_CommSum += sumcomm / NTask;
00471     }
00472 
00473   free(nrecv);
00474   free(ewaldlist);
00475   free(numnodeslist);
00476   free(costtreelist);
00477   free(timecommlist);
00478   free(timetreelist);
00479 }

00481 
00482 
00487 void set_softenings(void)
00488 {
00489   int i;
00490 
00491   if(All.ComovingIntegrationOn)
00492     {
00493       if(All.SofteningGas * All.Time > All.SofteningGasMaxPhys)
00494         All.SofteningTable[0] = All.SofteningGasMaxPhys / All.Time;
00495       else
00496         All.SofteningTable[0] = All.SofteningGas;
00497       
00498       if(All.SofteningHalo * All.Time > All.SofteningHaloMaxPhys)
00499         All.SofteningTable[1] = All.SofteningHaloMaxPhys / All.Time;
00500       else
00501         All.SofteningTable[1] = All.SofteningHalo;
00502       
00503       if(All.SofteningDisk * All.Time > All.SofteningDiskMaxPhys)
00504         All.SofteningTable[2] = All.SofteningDiskMaxPhys / All.Time;
00505       else
00506         All.SofteningTable[2] = All.SofteningDisk;
00507       
00508       if(All.SofteningBulge * All.Time > All.SofteningBulgeMaxPhys)
00509         All.SofteningTable[3] = All.SofteningBulgeMaxPhys / All.Time;
00510       else
00511         All.SofteningTable[3] = All.SofteningBulge;
00512       
00513       if(All.SofteningStars * All.Time > All.SofteningStarsMaxPhys)
00514         All.SofteningTable[4] = All.SofteningStarsMaxPhys / All.Time;
00515       else
00516         All.SofteningTable[4] = All.SofteningStars;
00517       
00518       if(All.SofteningBndry * All.Time > All.SofteningBndryMaxPhys)
00519         All.SofteningTable[5] = All.SofteningBndryMaxPhys / All.Time;
00520       else
00521         All.SofteningTable[5] = All.SofteningBndry;
00522     }
00523   else
00524     {
00525       All.SofteningTable[0] = All.SofteningGas;
00526       All.SofteningTable[1] = All.SofteningHalo;
00527       All.SofteningTable[2] = All.SofteningDisk;
00528       All.SofteningTable[3] = All.SofteningBulge;
00529       All.SofteningTable[4] = All.SofteningStars;
00530       All.SofteningTable[5] = All.SofteningBndry;
00531     }
00532 
00533   for(i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00534     All.ForceSoftening[i] = 2.8 * All.SofteningTable[i];
00535 
00536   All.MinGasHsml = All.MinGasHsmlFractional * All.ForceSoftening[0];
00537 }
00538 
00539 
00544 int grav_tree_compare_key(const void *a, const void *b)
00545 {
00546   if(((struct gravdata_index *) a)->Task < (((struct gravdata_index *) b)->Task))
00547     return -1;
00548 
00549   if(((struct gravdata_index *) a)->Task > (((struct gravdata_index *) b)->Task))
00550     return +1;
00551 
00552   return 0;
00553 }
